column4: http://pastebin.com/m3b71423 can someone tell me how to duplicate this fdisk layout exactly? i can't figureo ut how to specify blocks, and when i specify cylinders it does not match up
AFAIK, different hard drives have different values of these, so one drive can necessarily be duplicated on another ??
looking at the output of fdisk from my old drive and the new one they seem identical
so i would like to simply copy the data over retaining the exactly same partition structure
